name: d3-force-3d
description: Force-directed graph layout in 1D, 2D or 3D using velocity Verlet integration.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -c --banner "$(preamble)" -g d3-collection:d3,d3-dispatch:d3,d3-binarytree:d3,d3-quadtree:d3,d3-octree:d3,d3-timer:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-force-3d.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run bundle && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-force-3d.js -c -m -o build/d3-force-3d.min.js && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-force-3d.bundle.js -c -m -o build/d3-force-3d.bundle.min.js
